displaying-data.title: Displaying Data
displaying-data.intro: Displaying data is job number one for any good application. In Angular, you bind data to elements in HTML templates and Angular automatically updates the UI as data changes.

user-input.title: User Input
user-input.intro: DOM events drive user input in Angular. You can use the native events like click, mouseover, and keyup. Angular uses a special syntax to register events to DOM elements. This section covers all the ins and outs of using the event syntax.

forms.title: Forms
forms.intro: A form creates a cohesive, effective, and compelling data entry experience. An Angular form coordinates a set of data-bound user controls, tracks changes, validates input, and presents errors.
